about_the_game:
[BETA DEMO]

Hello! This is not the final demo. A lot of content are still actively being developed. I just wanted to ask for help in testing the currently implemented system, and also get some feedback. But I also don't mind if you also just wanna check it out! :D ​I hope you have fun trying this beta demo!

[STORY]

Betrayed. Murdered. Rewound. Every painful death offers a chance to go back in time and rewrite your fate, but every rewind chips away at the lifeline that keeps your parents alive - your scholarship allowance. Each rewind comes with two gut-wrenching consequences:
  • Hold onto your memories but say goodbye to your coins, or
  • Lacking in coins, face a blank slate with aching void yearning for a lost love, and clues swallowed by the sands of time (game over).

Time is your enemy, your scholarship allowance your currency, and your heart the ultimate prize. Navigate a world where every path whispers promises and demands sacrifices.

Will you:
  • Seek vengeance for your betrayal?
  • Protect your parents from a fate worse than death?
  • Find true love in a web of deceit and shifting loyalties?

But each rewind resets your relationships. Every death is a gamble. Can you rewrite your fate before your coins run out and your heart pays the ultimate price?

[The Unforeseen Resurrection]

  • Otome Isekai RPG with impactful choices and real consequences
  • Unique time travel mechanic with many sacrifices
  • Romanceable characters with hidden agendas
  • Forge bonds to mend your broken heart and boost you charm (collect clothes!), while gaming your way to strength and coins.
  • Go to the academy to protect your scholarship allowance and safeguard your future.
  • Delve into the academy's secrets, unveil hidden treasures.
  • Sharpen your wits to unravel tangled mysteries and expose devious conspiracies.
  • Master deadly blades for thrilling action RPG battles against monstrous threats.

[Goals]


[The main goal of the game is to make lots of money]
The players would step into the role of a poor but strong-willed student, who needs money for lots of things. The main thing being that she'll die a second time - and permanently as in game over - if she's broke!

[Game over if broke]
This is because after death, she can use her special powers of coming back to life in the past with her memories intact, but with a hefty cost, which is a lot of gold! She can't afford to lose so much gold, because she also must grab all the medicine she can to help her sick parents.

[Spend money to make even more money]
One of the main sources of income in the game is a scholarship allowance. The higher the scholarship rank, the more gold the scholar gets. The protagonist is a scholar of the lowest rank. The player must help her spend money to increase her stats, which in turn will increase her scholarship rank, which will then reward her with more money.

Planned but Unconfirmed Features

  • Multiplayer
  • 3D Map Exploration
  • Dress Up
  • Dating Sim / Life Sim
  • Hack and Slash
  • Choose Your Own Adventure
  • Female Protagonist
  • Character Customization (with limits)
  • Pet (please tell me what pet you want: cat, dog, pigeon, frog, etc.)

Game Platforms

  • Windows: This is the initial platform during the development

name: The Unforeseen Resurrection - Otome Isekai RPG [Beta Demo]
short_description: A 3D open-world RPG with life-sim elements and otome isekai themes. It is set in a fantastical modern world, where computer games bleed into reality and digitized beasts lurk, you wield a unique power: time travel with a hefty price tag.
